question: Dear Mufti Sahab...What is the Basic confilict between Muslim and Jews??? Whats jews basic tenets of Faith? Why they are biggest enemy of Muslim????

The fundamental difference between Muslims and the Jews is in believing in
the Risaalat (prophethood) of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).

They do not believe in the Risaalat of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam). That leads them to disbelieve in the Qur'aan, Ahaadith and our
Shari'ah.
